I loved them!! They were amazing during the summer!! And fit perfectly!!
I thought it would be small because online buying is tricky especially with denim but this was a great fit. Came on time and didn't have a weird smell either. Would buy again.
These overalls a great quality for the price! Super comfortable and stretchy. They are also true to size.
Cute but runs super small

High quality, came quickly and fit my daughter great!

评论概述: Great fit and quality for price
评论详情: These were exactly what I was looking for! Product was exactly as described. True to color, true to size. Quality is pretty decent. Fabric is firm but gives enough stretch. Straps adjust to fit a long torso. Plenty of pockets. Inseam is long enough to cover everything :)
It was very comfortable and cute, but it shrank after one wash. Maybe if I had air dried it, it would have stayed the same size.
These are cute but I’m a thick gal who is 5’5 and they seemed to hug in all the wrong places. They would be cute on a smaller person with no hips or tummy. Returned to Amazon for a full refund.
He’s a very comfort
It was very comfortable definitely alot of room I could of sized down, I usually wear a 2xl but even an xl would of been fine. I still love them
Love the light fabric, very shirt but live the look
These overalls are fantastic! Fit on the loose sit, but that’s what I was wanting. Fit great and are super comfy!
Accurate size chart. Fits very nicely and is very comfortable
Usually am a small to medium.  Ordered style D medium and was super tight.  Going to return and size up and also try style B.  Quick delivery though.
Great quality denim and fit perfectly!
Great comfortable overalls! Doesn't get any better !
Too small ended up giving away
Great quality and is comfortable with strong stitching. Did fit smaller than normal sizes. If you wear a 16, order an 18 for it to be a little loose. The appearance is super cute with no wrinkles.
Love the wash, I did go up a size for a looser fit. I’m glad I did. Looks great nice quality …. I might get some more !!

评论概述: Cute but smell was not what expected
评论详情: Very cute, however the smell when you open the package is overpowering. Had to give two good washes to get rid of it. Fit perfectly and overall very comfortable.
Stinks super bad and can’t get the smell out

评论概述: Buttons fell off during first hour of wearing.
评论详情: These shorts are cute enough, but vcheaply made. The denim is stretchy and thin which is fine, but the buttons that hold the straps to the bibs keep falling off. This happened during the first hour of putting them on.  Not sure how to to fix this but I will try.  Also, the straps are pretty long.. They can be adjusted, but it was a little surprising.
I love these, but wish I had gotten a size smaller. They run a little large. Still love them and have worn them several times.
Love these, they’re so cute.  A little stiff, hoping they’ll break in.

I didnt find them to be that cute they are big big - I should have sized down maybe if they fit me better they would have looked better on and i would have liked them but i ended up returning - if you try SIZE DOWN one maybe -

Overalls are hit or miss on me. I am a pear shape, and hate anything too boxy. These are so comfy and still flattering. Not a denim material, but you can't tell, and this material is much softer anyways!

I am 5'8, a 36 C, between 155 and 158 lbs, and got this in L, and the fit is just perfect. Not tight and not uber baggy. I love how they fit and look. They are a little bit stretchy, and super comfortable.  You have your 2 side and back pockets, along with another pocket on the bib. The straps are adjustable, and also has 3 buttons on each side on the hips. Nothing sticks out awkwardly, as it is the case with some bibs. The leg part is folded and stitched into place. Love that it has belt loops, in case you want to put a belt on. Also looks great with those chain type belts, and a cute crop top. It appears to be made of great quality, and I have found that it helps when using the bip clips to just hold the button with your index finger and thumb in place, so you don't tug on it too much.  If you happen to have a little pooch, as I do, it does not accentuate that at all, it hides it quite nicely. I also like that the crotch part sits perfectly, and it's not too baggy or hanging down to your knees. That was something I was a bit worried about as I am a little bit on the taller side.  I did not notice any weird smell, as some reviewers have mentioned, just your normal new clothes smell. I have also had no problems with any shrinkage when washing. I do wash this in cold water on the delicate cycle, put in the dryer on air fluff only, and then finish air drying hung up.  I absolutely highly recommend these, I think it's a great addition to anyone's wardrobe, and these rompers/overalls/bibs are really in style right now, and fairly priced as well.

Ordered a size up for an oversized fit and felt it was still snug. Ordered according to measurements. These overalls would have worked well for the themed party they were ordered for but ended up not being quite the right style I was looking for.
These are cute, and a decent quality for the price. However, one of the strap buttons broke after the third time I wore them, making them functionally unusable. Not recommended.
Wanted looser pair but these seem to run a little small
Love these short overalls! They have great breathing room, theyre stretchy and the color I got was nice. I want black ones now.
These look so flattering. I love the pockets. The fit is great. Very comfortable. Very nice bib shorts .
These are a little baggy in the front but it’s okay bc they look great! They are very stretchy so if you sized down I believe it would be okay. However great overalls

评论概述: This is not made for curvy people.
评论详情: These are so cute and I wanted to love them but I am short and curvy and even with a body suit, the gaps on the side were huge and the strap length felt off. The material and quality was great but it just did not fit my size correctly. On someone taller, this would probably be perfect.
Very cute.  Love it.

I was so excited to get in these overalls to wear to my daughter’s first birthday in two days. To my surprise I open the overalls to not only be smushed in plastic, smelling dirty, but there is a DIRTY TISSUE in the pocket. Where is this even from? What is going on? This is disgusting!
These overalls Little over month before the buttons broke.

I loved these way more than I thought I would. I usually find that buying overalls is a challenge. I can never find a pair that fits right in the shorts. This pair surprised me though as the shorts fit exceptionally well and look great with the overall straps. I feel comfortable and confident wearing them and I think the price is great for the quality. I would definitely recommend to any woman who struggles to find a great fitting pair of overalls as well!
looks great and is super comfortable

These look cute on. The straps adjust easily and the pockets are nice and deep for a phone. I like the color. The product description said handwash, but I washed them in cold water in the washing machine and hung them to dry the first few times, then started putting them in the dryer on LOW heat and they come out fine.
Love my new short overalls. Comfortable, stylish and they look great. I weigh 170 lbs and I’m 5’3 and XL fit me perfectly.

Three of the studs have already fallen out. Completely out. But top studs that you hook the shoulders to and one of the sides. Other are lose too. Waiting for them to come off. Super cute but really disappointed.
Didn’t think I could pull this off but being able to adjust it, buttons on the side-got so many compliments

These arrived last night, I threw them in the wash for a quick cycle because I really wanted to wear them to the playground with my kids today, they smell really funky but one more FULL wash cycle (maybe with a splash of vinegar) ought to do the trick. I’m 5’7” and 150lbs, I ordered a medium. These pictures are after an entire playground session with two tiny kids, so you can see how they hold up their shape. I am really impressed! They are a good kind of baggy without becoming saggy after a couple hours! Very soft, very thin material for summer comfort. I have the black pair coming now!

I am really surprised by the quality of the material.  Wear a size 12 and the large fits me perfectly. It's made of very sturdy and thick jean material. I am very pleased with this purchase and I plan on buying a couple more.
Ordered an XXL. I usually wear an XL. I'm 5'2", 202 lb, 40D bra.
Perfect fit
This is adorable!  It fits just a little big, so may want to order down a size.

These overalls are pretty darn cute. They have a lot of adjustability to make them fit your body shape which is very nice. I like the color as well. Pockets are nice and deep, I can fit my entire Galaxy S23 ultra in it, which is pretty rare for women's clothing. thin enough to not make you hot as well, but I do hope they hold up for a while because they are so thin, I do have concerns.
Ordered an extra large because I wanted it for gardening, big and comfortable. The color and fabric were great, as pictured. It is probably true to size. Great buy!

评论概述: A perfect outfit to dress up and dress down to be comfy
评论详情: Perfect fit! Quality was amazing
These are so cute! I think overalls are making a comeback so I had to get some. They fit well and are comfortable. I would recommend, they are so fun for summer!

I got these for my daughter. She loves them!! They fit her perfectly, but I think they could be a smidge longer. She has a long torso, so they kind up ride up some on her but nothing to complain about. The color and style are flattering and they're so cute! Get a pair!!

these overalls fit well and are quite comfortable.  i wasn't thinking when i orderd 'shortalls.' i feel like i am a bit too old to be wearing something as short as these, so i have taken out the necessary tacking stitches so that i can let them out to maximum length.

评论概述: I just learned a new word - shortalls!
评论详情: I’ve been wearing long overalls for many years. They are my preferred way to dress most of the time. This summer I thought it was about time to try out the shorter style of overall - shortalls. And because I live in Florida and long overalls are a bit too much for summer, it was time for a change. I am so glad I made the switch. These 5 pocket shortalls are as good as any brand of long overalls I have ever worn. They are very well made of a medium weight denim. I chose Color B, Light Blue featuring my favorite cargo style patch pockets in front. The cross back design is a fantastic look and emphasizes a tapered waist. I ordered my usual size and the fit is perfect. Order one size larger if you prefer to wear your shortalls loose. I have one question. Why are there beltloops?
The jean quality is thin, stretchy, and cheap. Itchy feeling. The folded hem doesn’t stay even if you iron them they roll after washing.

评论概述: Size up if you’re looking for a baggy fit
评论详情: I am 5’1” and weigh 130lb. I ordered both a small and a medium. The small definitely fit fine, but the medium had a little bagginess to it which I preferred. The straps are fairly long, but they are able to be tightened quite a bit and fit nicely. Definitely very cute!
Super comfortable, very well made enough room. I like the style and cut, good fabric. I love it fit very well.
Fit to size, material and stitching is good quality.  Straps easily adjustable to get perfect fit.

I’m in love with this little romper! It’s perfect for spring, has functional pockets front and back and surprisingly fits my small frame really well! I love the relaxed fit, and the material/buttons/clips don’t feel cheap at all. I style mine with more of a form fitting top or bodysuit and it’s just too cute.  I ordered the small in Indigo B. I am 5’2” 125 pounds, 32 B, short torso and am more leggy, so I did have to take the adjustable straps as snug as they will go.

评论概述: LOVE em; just be mindful of sizing!! 👌🏾
评论详情: So my romper/jumper era marches on and shan’t be stopped!!  Having ordered from this company prior, I was a bit concerned in regards to sizing. Despite being advertised as “loose” the previous long pair had tapering and an invisible zipper. As a result, I was cautious and ordered up. I wanted to be sure about the inseam and my thighs/hips.  Turns out? There was no need. When they arrived and went on, my pair (Style A in black XXL) fit a bit big, but not TOO bad. No rips, tears and are heavy gauge denim — very well made. I’ll have to snag the same style or Style B in a dark blue.  Overall (no pun)? I love em!! Just be mindful of your style preference and sizing before ordering 👌🏾
I love these. Feels great on the skin and it fits perfectly.  Measurements: Bust: 34" Waist: 27" Hips: 37"

评论概述: Cute but the straps were tight for person on the taller side.
评论详情: I really wanted to love these, but I will have to alter the straps. I am 5'8 and pulled the straps out as long as they with go and they are tight. They are loose about my hips and stomach, just short from crotch area to shoulders.
These are the first pair of coveralls shorts that are actually long enough in the torso. They fit perfect great price order and more for sure.

For the longest time, I've wanted to try a pair of overalls, but I've always worried that I'd hate the way I look in them. These overalls proved me wrong. They're super flattering and have great pockets. They're also made of real denim (not that thin stuff you'll see), which is awesome. I'm super happy with these and can't wait to rock them this summer!
The design of these is so flattering. They aren’t too short to be uncomfortable. The buckles are durable. Love that it has pockets as well. The wash of the Jean material is perfect.

Oooo, I love these denim "shortalls"! They are flexible and comfy, true to size, classy and stylish, and very versatile. Pair them with a puffed sleeves blouse, vintage jewelry and Oxfords, and you will be all ready for a casual date or trip shopping! With a T-shirt and tennis shoes you can play a sport with friends in it, or with boots and a sweater shirt you can go on a lovely morning hike!  Thank you for reading my review! All of my reviews are honest and true to my likes and dislikes. I am unbiased in my opinions. I hope this helped you in making an informed purchasing decision!
I really liked these shorts. They come in so many colors and they’re all so comfy!

Yay, the overalls fit and I like the look. I was hoping the end roll on the short portion could be rolled down for more length, but the end of the shorts are sewn into place. I do like the material and this will be fun in summer. I do recommend this product and I am a size 18 for reference. Nothing was tight or limited movement.

It will be cute when I’ve lost a few inches of belly fat and can fit the overalls over it lol. They’re tight on my bum, so I would suggest sizing up one or two sizes if you’re curvy in the slightest. Other than that, the material is nice and the style is cute
I was so excited to get these. Got my size Large which is a 12/14. Unfortunately they run really small. Definitely size up 1 if you want a slim Fitz size up 2 if you want them loose.

This is a very cute summer outfit.  Order a larger size if you want the baggy look.  It is a jeanny material.  It really is not a thick material but seems to be well made.  It has the worn and tattered look.  nice bold colors.

The Pink Queen Women's Denim Shortalls have an accurate and cute denim look to them. I usually wear an XL, but opted for the XXL and they fit well. I was afraid they might be too short, but they are actually a good length. The material is a thick denim jean quality. They are not lightweight or thin. The straps are adjustable. The buttons and closures work together as expected. There are also buttons on the sides to allow for easy on/off access. If you wore overalls back in the day when they were popular, I think you will be satisfied with the Pink Queen's version of them. I would recommend these denim overalls.

I was nervous I might not like these, but I am glad I took a chance on them! They are very soft, but still denim. The distressed details are stylish- and placed well. The fit is great- I am 5.1 and 104lbs and I was worried they would be either too long or just weirdly baggy. Instead they are just the right lenght, similar to model picture, but I can adjust the straps making them just a bit relaxed. They are slightly fitted again, just like the model picture, but not tight or baggy. Cant wait to just throw these on during spring and summer.

评论概述: Cute Overalls....wish they came in smaller size
评论详情: These overalls are cute and stylish.  They were a little big, even considering that overalls are supposed to be big.  I wish they came in an extra small!  The quality is good and I love the overall look---just wish it was smaller!
